Text: Thanks very much for this. I hope they don't cancel this, because it's a very funny and creative show.

The show does have it's momments, but it has more of a sitcom vibe than the rest of the sunday night shows.

 But hey, first seasons aren't normally that great anyways :P

 Anyways, thx eztv! Global website stopped streaming the SNS's for some reason >.
